wikitext.*:
'''BDSM AU'''是欧美同人圈三大设定之一，这种设定中，最主要的一类子设定是'''D/S'''，两者有时被混同。
==欧美圈的代表作==
* [[General and Dr. Sheppard]] ([[SGA]]) by [[Xanthe]], 2006
* [[Coming Home (SGA fic)|Coming Home]] ([[SGA]]) by [[Xanthe]], 2006
* [[Hiding in Plain Sight]] ([[SGA]]/[[NCIS]] [[crossover]]) by [[Xanthe]], 2008
* [http://www.xanthe.org/viewstory.php?sid=72 Two Masters] ([[NCIS]]) by [[Xanthe]], 2011
* [http://www.xanthe.org/viewstory.php?sid=222 Possession] ([[Suits]]) by [[Xanthe]], 2011
:Some stories explicitly set in [[Xanthe]]'s 'verse:
:* [http://archiveofourown.org/works/185733/chapters/273212 Bound Together] ([[Torchwood]]) by hab318princess, 2011

* [[Take Clothes Off As Directed]] ([[SGA]]) by [[helenish]], 2006
